Summary A Data Centre and Network Professional with a unique perspective. 
Currently Manager of the Group Data Centre and Operations run by Fujitsu on behalf of Home Retail Group. 
Consulted on, designed and project managed the building of Data Centres and Networks for IBM.  UK lead consultant on Data Centre Consolidation Relocation and development of portable and modular Data Centres. 
 
Skills and Achievements 
•	Develop Data Centre Strategy, contribute to IT Strategy. 
•	Business Transformation including TUPE. 
•	Financial Management, Op ex to £9,500,000, and Cap ex to £32,000,000. 
•	Define and implement DR and BCP solutions including RPO, RTO deliverables. 
•	Change management for Data Centre created, including deviation process for repetitive, successful changes. 
•	Oversee all aspects of Operational delivery including Infrastructure, Communications, Database, Backup, Recovery and Compliance.  
•	Deliver high availability of business systems with no downtime. 
•	Initiate Programmes for Consolidation and Virtualisation which have generated a £100,000 pa saving in power usage in the Data Centre. 
•	Own and control Backups, Recovery, Assets and Access. 
•	Manage technical resource responsible for Server, Storage and Comms deployment in the Data Centre. 
•	Currently manage seventeen FTE and 6 Third Party Contractors, have managed up to 34 FTE and 72 contract staff. 
•	Qualified in IBM World Wide Project Management Methodology (based on Prince 2) and ITIL. 
•	Certified Data Centre Management Professional, Certified Data Centre Design Specialist, Chartered IT Professional. 
•	UK lead consultant for IBM on Data Centre Consolidation, Relocation and Transformation services.  
•	Frequent International assignments mainly in Europe but also in the USA and UAE.  
•	Global IBM recognition for four major projects, awarded the Chairman’s Award for Customer Excellence. Summary A Data Centre and Network Professional with a unique perspective.

Summary SAP PS FICO Consultant with 10 Yrs of working experience. Specialized in mapping business processes in Media and entertainment industry. Summary SAP PS FICO Consultant with 10 Yrs of working experience. Specialized in mapping business processes in Media and entertainment industry. SAP PS FICO Consultant with 10 Yrs of working experience. Specialized in mapping business processes in Media and entertainment industry. SAP PS FICO Consultant with 10 Yrs of working experience. Specialized in mapping business processes in Media and entertainment industry. Experience Managing Consultant IBM May 2015  – Present (4 months) New Jersey Sr. Business Analyst Viacom June 2014  –  May 2015  (1 year) Greater New York City Area Business Analyst for SAP project accounting and asset accounting in Media Programming. SAP PS_Assets_IS Media Lead Consultant IBM April 2011  –  2014  (3 years) Greater New York City Area Project: Viacom Media Networks 
 
As a Module Lead for SAP PS and FI, responsible for Analysis, design, development, testing and implementation of customized SAP ERP Media solutions which covers SAP PS and Asset Accounting for IBM US customer Viacom Media Network and rolled world wide VMN entities. Project scope includes implementation of FICO, SD, PS, MM, SRM module along with IS media component MPM (Media Product Master).  
Major Roles and Responsibilities: 
1. Understand the business requirements, check feasibility of mapping requirement into standard SAP during the blueprinting phase.  
2. Work closely with the client team for designing a solution fit to business requirements and document change request. 
3. Discuss the current business processes. 
4. Writing business blue print documents which caters to As-Is and To-Be processes with list of authorizations, developments, standard reports & forms. 
5. Responsible for effective communication between the project team and the customer. Provide day to day direction to the project team and regular project status to the customer. 
6. Identify developments based on RICEFW list during gap analysis phase.  
7. Translate customer requirements into formal requirements and design documents, establish specific solutions, and leading the efforts including programming and testing that culminate in client acceptance of the results. 
8. Conduct the prototyping workshops and solution validation sessions. 
9. Establish Quality Procedure for the team and continuously monitor and audit to ensure team meets quality goals. 
10. Involved in analyzing business requirements, carrying out fit-gap analysis, process design, customization, etc SAP PS_Assets_IS Media Lead Consultant IBM January 2010  –  March 2011  (1 year 3 months) Mumbai Area, India Project: UTV SAP Implementation 
 
As a Module Lead responsible for Analysis, design, development, testing and implementation of customized SAP ERP solutions for new implementations and upgrades for our IBM India customer UTV Software Communication Ltd 
UTV Software Communications Ltd (UTV), India's first integrated global media and Entertainment Company. The UTV group has expanded into 6 verticals which include Motion Pictures, Television Content, Broadcasting, Games Content, New Media and News. Project scope includes implementation of FICO, SD, PS and MM module in phase 1 and new dimensional modules like CRM, BI, BW etc in phase 2. 
Major roles and responsibilities for this project are: 
1. Lead the PS module team in delivering solution to IBM customer in the Media and Entertainment sector. 
2.Deliver new and complex high quality solutions to clients in response to varying business requirements 
3.Manage scope, planning, tracking, change control, aspects of the project system module.  
4. Do an effective communication between the project team and the customer. Provide day to day direction to the project team and regular project status to the customer. 
5. Translate customer requirements into formal requirements and design documents, establish specific solutions, and leading the efforts including programming and testing that culminate in client acceptance of the results. 
6.Utilize in-depth knowledge of functional and Technical experience in SAP ERP and other leading-edge products and technology in conjunction with industry and business skills to deliver solutions to customer. 
7. Use of Media Product Master, a component of SAP IS Media as a key component for designing the SAP solution to the client. 
8. Involve in analyzing business requirements, carrying out fit-gap analysis, process design, customization, integration testing, User Acceptance Testing, Final preparation, go-live and go-live support etc. SAP PS Lead Consultant IBM April 2009  –  January 2010  (10 months) Mumbai Area, India Project : Star TV SAP Implementation 
 
Satellite Television for the Asian Region (STAR) is an Asian TV service. It’s headquartered in Hong Kong, with regional offices in India, mainland China, Taiwan, Singapore, as well as in other south Asian countries. STAR broadcasts over 60 services in 13 languages. Shows include entertainment, sports, movies, music, news and documentaries. 
The project scope included implementation of PS-IM, MM and FI, CO. Locations covering geographies of India, HK, TW and China. The IBM project team involved approximately 10 Functional and 5 Technical consultants. The Scope included PS, MM and FICO and Basis. 
Major roles and responsibilities for this project are: 
1. Prepare Business Blue Prints, vetting the Gap analysis and preparation of Function Specifications for developments.  
2. Understand current business process of Media industries and other legacy system running at STAR. 
3. Work with Business Analyst for translating business requirements into Functional Requirements Document and to Detailed Design Documents  
4. Lead analysis sessions, gather requirements and write specification and functional design documents for enhancements and customization; Analyze product impact  
5. Present and defend product designs and architecture to clients  
6. Coordinate and communicate tasks with developers  
7. Ensure that development is performed as per requirements  
8. Work with as QA to create test scripts and scenarios for enhancements and customizations to the core product  
9. Communicate activities/progress to project managers, business development, business analysts and clients  
10. I worked on 1 implementation and 1 support project with Satyam. SAP PS Consultant Capgemini Consulting India Pvt February 2006  –  March 2008  (2 years 2 months) I worked in CG for 2 yrs with one support project in telecom domain. Assistant Manager Projects Kirloskar Brothers Limited October 2003  –  February 2006  (2 years 5 months) I worked in KBL for around 2.5 yrs in Turnkey project division. I was working as assistant project manager for a turnkey project also I worked on a SAP enhancement project as a core team member. Summary With over 15 years of experience Fred is an experienced international business intelligence consultant who worked for SME's and also for the Fortune 500 companies in the world. During his career he has been through all different tasks and jobs related to the business intelligence domain. Fred has had as well development as management roles. Because of the combination of technical skills and business knowledge Fred is an excellent business intelligence consultant with a broad international network. His personality is about perfectionism, ambition, empathy and communication. Due to these characteristics Fred is able to manage in a very natural way. In addition his knowledge and experience in working with different cultures makes that he's a contribution to all (international) teams.  
 
Besides his work in the field of Business Intelligence, Fred also loves new technology, in special augmented reality is one of the domains Fred believes in. The projects related to new technologies and especially in the augmented reality domain is done from the subsidiary of FCV Consult called ARVisions.  
 
Fred is also hired to speak on seminars about his vision on technology and in special his vision about business intelligence, data warehousing, predictive analysis and big data. Experience Owner / Independent Consultant FCV Consult January 2005  – Present (10 years 8 months) Amsterdam Area, Netherlands FCV Consult is specialized in corporate performance management, business intelligence, data warehousing, data mining and predictive analysis. Since 2005 we work for clients in the retail & wholesale, professional services, industry and non-profit sector. In addition, we look beyond simply the technical solutions, and take responsibility for project results. Owner ARVisions May 2010  – Present (5 years 4 months) Amsterdam Area, Netherlands Subsidiary of FCV Consult B.V. which is consulting Media Firms about Augmented Reality and New Media Solutions. Managing Director / Co Owner CPM Factory BV April 2011  –  December 2012  (1 year 9 months) Hilversum General management, sales and marketing within CPM Factory. Great fun working with the best professionals in the field of corporate performance management. Co Owner / CEO Touching Media 2007  –  2009  (2 years) Amsterdam Area, Netherlands Business Development in the domains of Augmented Reality Solutions, Interactive Marketing Solutions and Cross Media Solutions. Also nominated for the final of the Broos van Erp Award for the most innovating new media company of the year 2009. Consultant Corporate Performance Management Eniac Business Intelligence B.V. April 2005  –  June 2006  (1 year 3 months) Zaltbommel, the Netherlands Development and advice of the 300plus SME's that Eniac had as their customers. Report environment was mainly based on the own ERP system or BPCS. All AS400/DB2 based solutions with a IBM Cognos or SAP Business Objects front-end. Furthermore trained a lot of great consultants and responsible for pre-sales demonstrations and marketing strategy of the business intelligence department. Business Consultant Business Intelligence B.V. / BI4U September 2003  –  April 2005  (1 year 8 months) Driebergen, the Netherlands Business Development for standard procedures and developing a standard skill set for this consulting firm.
